Mary Louise Cosmetics Miracle Serum

Brand: Mary Louise Cosmetics

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Baobab Oil(Adansonia digitata), Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Vitamin C (Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate), Vitamin E (Tocotrienol)

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Us
